summary: THE SEAT RECLINER BOLTS ON THE DRIVER'S POWER SEAT BROKE CAUSING THE RECLINER PORTION OF THE SEAT TO RECLINE RAPIDLY WITHOUT WARNING.   THE CAR WAS NOT BEING DRIVEN AT THE TIME.  THE MANUFACTURER'S REPRESENTATIVE ROBERT CLARK NOTED THAT MY VEHICLE WAS NOT LISTED AS HAVING THIS PROBLEM.   I AM STILL WAITING FOR THE DEALER TO THE FIX PROBLEM.*JB
